list.name: state
list.query: SELECT * FROM vw_connect_events WHERE $timeFilter AND value='$VIN' AND tags=~/state/

list.name: climatization
list.query: SELECT * FROM vw_connect_events WHERE $timeFilter AND value='$VIN' AND tags=~/climatization/

list.name: charging
list.query: SELECT * FROM vw_connect_events WHERE $timeFilter AND value='$VIN' AND tags=~/charging/

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.batteryStatus.currentSOC_pct" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.batteryStatus.cruisingRangeElectric_km" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "0_userdata.0.vw-connect.0.$VIN.currentTotalRange_km" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "0_userdata.0.vw-connect.0.$VIN.currentConsumption_kwhp100km" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "0_userdata.0.vw-connect.0.$VIN.efficiency_pct" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "daswetter.0.NextHours.Location_1.Day_1.current.temp_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.chargingStatus.chargePower_kW" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.chargingStatus.chargeRate_kmph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.description: Select Car if you have multiple cars in your account
list.label: Car
list.name: VIN
